text: Deposit multiple forms of collateral in a single vault to healthily secure your loan against liquidation. Vaults are non-custodial, providing users maximum security & full access to their funds.
Provide liquidity to DEX's and Maven's lending pools, stake your LP tokens in our yield farms, and earn staked MVN in return.
Stake your MVN, delegate your votes, and earn rewards for participating in and securing the network.
Maven’s governance is completely controlled by the community through an on-chain DAO. Stake your MVN tokens and delegate to the Satellite of your choice, or run your own Satellite.
Operate a Satellite to play an active role in Maven’s governance, control the Treasury, and provide the network with on-chain data via the oracle. Get paid in staked MVN and XTZ.
Maven relies on Satellites to provide accurate and reliable on-chain real-world data, and get rewarded according their respective stake and delegations.
